title: Users Collection Schema
description: Schema describing the structure of the Firestore 'users' collection for a ToDo app.

^[A-Za-z0-9_-]+$.description: A single user document in the Firestore 'users' collection.

birthdate.description: A timestamp representing the user's birthdate.

created_time.description: A timestamp representing when the user account was created.

display_name.description: The display name of the user.

photo_url.description: URL to the user's profile photo.
